definition: to boil/to roll/to take a hike/Get lost!

sentences.english: One trade group has turned to a rock band called Gyoko, or Fishing Port.
sentences.chinese: 某个行业团体已经求助一个叫做“渔港”的摇滚乐队。

sentences.english: Bill gets a kickout of listening to rock music.
sentences.chinese: 比尔从听摇滚乐中得到快乐。

sentences.english: It was time to pig out on rock and roll.
sentences.chinese: 该是尽情享受摇滚乐的时候了。

sentences.english: A： I always turn the mega bass on when I listen to rock.
sentences.chinese: 我听摇滚乐时总是喜欢打开超重低音。

sentences.english: Rock music and blues are the main influences on hs music.
sentences.chinese: 摇滚乐和布鲁斯对他的音乐有着主要的影响。

sentences.english: When it comes to rock music, Aerosmith is my favorite band.
sentences.chinese: 提到摇滚乐，史密斯飞船是我最喜欢的乐队。

sentences.english: Oh, Rock Band, is there a problem you can’t handle?
sentences.chinese: 哦，摇滚乐队，有问题是你们不能解决的吗？

sentences.english: British rock group is said to have taken its name from Muddy Waters' song. The Rolling Stones performed for the first time in 1962.
sentences.chinese: 据说英国某摇滚乐队就是以马迪沃特斯的歌来命名的。

sentences.english: Usually the burnouts dress in jeans and wear the black rock-concert.
sentences.chinese: 吸毒族一般穿牛仔裤，黑色摇滚乐T恤。

sentences.english: Kavarna is a real-life city built on rock'n'roll.
sentences.chinese: 卡瓦尔纳是建在摇滚乐上的富有生气的城市。

sentences.english: A lot of rock stars started out playing in garage bands before they got big.
sentences.chinese: 许多著名的摇滚乐手是从车库乐队起家的。

sentences.english: The immediate ancestor of rock "n" roll is rhythm -and-blues.
sentences.chinese: 摇滚乐直接源自节奏布鲁斯。

sentences.english: My neighbour played rock and roll late last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我邻居播放摇滚乐到很晚。

sentences.english: We used to go to concerts and listen to rock music down there.
sentences.chinese: 我们常去听演唱会，去那儿听摇滚乐。

sentences.english: Their rock band is going to record their first record next month.
sentences.chinese: 下个月她们的摇滚乐团将灌录她们的第一张唱片。

sentences.english: Kurt had started out playing bass in a rock band.
sentences.chinese: 库尔特起初在一个摇滚乐队弹低音吉他。

definition: Cui Jian (1961-), father of Chinese rock music
